DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to determine whether the use of breast cancer patients' own electronic reporting of side effects to chemotherapy in a treatment setting has an impact on the handling of side effects and on the number of hospitalizations, febrile neutropenia and dose adjustments. We are using the Patient-Reported Outcomes version of the Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (PRO-CTCAE) for the patients' reporting of side effects.
DOC.brief_title: Electronic Patient Reporting of Side Effects to Chemotherapy: A Cluster Randomized Controlled Trial
